bug.short_desc: drafts cause NPE during query synchronization

long_desc.thetext:
Gerrit 2.4.1
I have a Gerrit query setup for "My changes" and another user added me to a Draft.
When I try to synchronize my query I get the following NPE. If I remove myself as a reviewer from the Draft (via web UI), the problem goes away.
java.lang.NullPointerException at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.gerrit.core.GerritTaskDataHandler.updateTaskData(GerritTaskDataHandler.java:195) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.gerrit.core.GerritConnector.performQuery(GerritConnector.java:226) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.core.sync.SynchronizeQueriesJob.synchronizeQuery(SynchronizeQueriesJob.java:311) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.core.sync.SynchronizeQueriesJob.synchronizeQueries(SynchronizeQueriesJob.java:268) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.tasks.core.sync.SynchronizeQueriesJob.run(SynchronizeQueriesJob.java:201) at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:54)
Thanks for the report. I remember seeing this at some point and I thought this was fixed already but need to verify that and add a test.

It looks like this wasn't actually fixed. The status is not recognized properly and hence causes an NPE. This will require a bit of hackery since Status is an enum that we can't extend without changing the underlying Orbit libraries. The NPE needs to be fixed in any case.

Pushed a review here: https://git.eclipse.org/r/9418. I'm working on setting up test infrastructure for creating drafts etc. as part of automated testing but have manually tested with a draft pushed here for now: http://mylyn.org/gerrit-2.4.0/#/c/2/.
The change was merged into master and the 3.8.x branch.
